oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Magnetoresistance measurements on FE-rich and CO-rich amorphous-alloys
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: PIRAMANAYAGAM, SN
NIGAM, AK
CHANDRA, G
PRASAD, S
VENKATARAMANI, N
SCHRINGI, SN
KRISHNAN, R
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: Magnetoresistance measurements were carried out in fields of up to 5 T on a-Co80-x-yFexMnyB12Si8 alloys at various temperatures. At 100 K, a positive slope is observed in the magnetoresistance curve of Go-rich alloys and a negative slope in Fe-rich alloys. The addition of Mn decreases the slope in Go-rich alloys and increases it in Fe-rich alloys.
oai_dc:dc.dc:identifier: JOURNAL OF MAGNETISM AND MAGNETIC MATERIALS,140,281-282
oai_dc:dc.dc:source: International Conference on Magnetism - ICM 94 (13th IUPAP Triennial Conference on Magnetism),WARSAW, POLAND,AUG 22-26, 1994
